graph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    My implementation of a graph. It uses an Integer matrix and contains various manipulations methods.

      • offset

        public static int[] offset(int[] origin,
                           int offsetX,
                           int offsetY)
        Calculates the offset coordinate. Mainly implemented to improve readability of jump and prune methods.
        Parameters:
        origin - Coordinate from which to offset
        offsetX - Offset value X
        offsetY - Offset value Y
        Returns:
        Return offset coordinate
